page.title: 06ROLLS ROYCE Aero engines.
page.content: This area of{Derby}is famous for the{ {ROLLS ROYCE(1971)AERO ENGINE}factory, employing approximately{16,000}people. The company specialises in high precision{gas turbines}for civil and military use,over{1200}operators using their products throughout the{world.} There are{29 aero engines}with 279 engine marks,requiring{192,000}live part numbers manufactured throughout the group. { Derby}is the{Headquarters}for the firm which produces{RB211}and{SPEY {engines.}The RB211 powers the{Boeing {747 Jumbo Jet, 757,}and{Lockheed {Tristar passenger}planes.The{engine produces a{maximum}of{235.8kN}of {thrust.}The{SPEY}powers the{Buccaneer and{Nimrod military}aircraft. { Rolls Royce}runs an{apprenticeship} scheme to train its future workforce.
